categories: Ultimate Tubeless Setup Kit XC / Gravel
description: Everything you need to go tubeless on your XC ride.44mm Presta valves are CNC-machined 6061 aluminum.Install valves by hand, or remove with an 11mm spanner and 4mm hex.Latex formula tubeless sealant is non-corrosive, ammonia-free and washable with water.Sealant is compatible with CO2, at pressure range 15-120psi and  -20 to +50°C.25mm rim tape applies with pressure-sensitive adhesive backing.Recommended inner rim width 23-25mm.Recommended rim height up to 30mm.Kit includes 2 valves, 2 rolls of rim tape, 2 pouches of sealant and seal patches.
name: Muc-Off Ultimate Tubeless Setup Kit XC / Gravel
